howDid.question: How did $VRSC come into circulation?
howDid.answer: 100% of $VRSC is created through public mining and staking.

maxSupply.question: What is $VRSC maximum supply?
maxSupply.answer: The maximum supply of $VRSC that will ever exist is 83,540,184.

purchase.question: Where can I buy $VRSC?
purchase.answer: <0>You can buy $VRSC through multiple exchanges. The exchanges are listed <1>here</1></0>

ico.question: Was there an ICO for Verus?
ico.answer: No. Verus is fairly launched, with equal opportunity for everyone to earn coins through mining and staking. Also, Verus had no premine, and has no developer fees.

icoPrice.question: What was the $VRSC ICO price?
icoPrice.answer: Verus never had an ICO. All coins came fairly into the market by mining and staking.

roadmap.question: Where can I find a roadmap?
roadmap.answer: Verus has no roadmaps or deadlines. Verus is a community project without central entities dictating project direction or commercial interests.

mine.question: Can I mine Verus?
mine.answer: <0>Yes. Anyone can start mining Verus efficiently with CPUs, mobile phone and ARM devices. <1>Learn more</1></0>

stake.question: Can I stake Verus?
stake.answer: <0>Yes. Anyone can start staking Verus without any minimum requirements. <1>Learn more</1></0>

privacy.question: Is Verus a privacy coin?
privacy.answer: Verus supports fully private, zero knowledge transactions that use zk- SNARK technologies.

impermanent.question: What is impermanent loss?
impermanent.answer: Impermanent loss is nothing more than the difference between constant-mix vs buy-and-hold strategy. An example: when you hold a currency that is 50/50% backed by $VRSC and BTC, you might suffer an opportunity loss when compared to holding $VRSC and BTC directly. The upside is you will have less risk.
